instruction: Write a personal letter of recommendation for someone you know
output:
I am writing to highly recommend John Smith. I have known him for several years, and I can vouch for his integrity and work ethic. He is highly capable and creative, extremely reliable, and an exceptional collaborator. He is a quick learner and an excellent communicator, and he is able to think strategically and find creative and efficient solutions for complex problems. 

John is an invaluable asset to any team and I am confident that he will be a tremendous asset to any organization. He is an outstanding individual and I highly recommend him.
